long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to scroll between multiple parts of a webpage quickly?

This extension allows users to create custom saved locations Within a webpage.

Users create a more detailed bookmark, not only the page but the section of the page.

Once these locations are saved, users can jump between these saved locations with a push of a button!

Pins can be saved in addition to being loaded later.

Multiple pages can be saved and navigated between using just the extension.

I developed this because of the frustration I would feel when researching something complex and I had to spend time looking for parts of a webpage I had read previously, and wanted to read again.

I hope others might actually find it useful!
